name: Delivery Dog
description:
Delivery Dog is a 3rd person, hike-like game where you take the role of Milo, the new mail animal on Little Dyr Island. He cycles around to deliver packages and letters to the islanders. By exploring the island and meeting other inhabitants he learns the stories of a loveable community.

Developed by:

Andrea Trevisin

Előd Vizi

Jakob Raith

Nilas Røpke Driessen

Valbona Sinani

Fabio Scita
